title: Artistic Beginnings
description: I started my first studies at the national conservatory in clarinet, far from imagining the future twists and turns

title: The Spark of Code
description: My first contact with the world of development, one year at the EXIA CESI engineering school

title: Turning Point #1, Sound Engineering
description: Career change, bachelor's degree in sound engineering at Abbey Road Institute Paris/London

title: Freelancing Begins
description: In 2018 I started freelancing as a sound engineer, working on podcasts, ads, music, audiobooks... I spent 4-5 years through multiple varied projects!

title: My First Startup
description: 3 years at Koober, a mobile app as audiovisual manager handling creation and a team of voice-over artists

title: Turning Point #2, Web Development & O'Clock
description: Unfortunately Koober was liquidated, and I decided without hesitation to turn to web development at O'Clock school

title: Japan
description: With my diploma in hand and my apprenticeship for the following year secured, I didn't think long before deciding to leave for a month in Japan

title: Wild Code School, Quanted Square and Apprenticeship
description: Back from Japan I immediately started my 1-year apprenticeship at Quanted Square while training at Wild Code School to prepare for the Application Designer title

title: Yuzu
description: 2024 is the year Yuzu arrived! My little Shiba Inu who changed my life!

title: QuantedSquare
description: I will never be grateful enough to QuantedSquare, Julien and Fabien for hiring me after 1 year of apprenticeship and trusting me while allowing me to learn at a breakneck pace! ðŸ«¶

title: Odysway
description: My first major project as a developer, contributing to the development of Odysway, an online travel agency

title: Crown
description: First project from scratch with QuantedSquare, we built Crown, a real-time auction app for procurement/industrials

title: Today x Us
description: The QuantedSquare adventure is ending, and I'm heading towards new horizons, looking for a new career opportunity!
